response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, valued at an estimated $12,000 to you. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $14,000. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows me to maintain a competitive edge in the market while securing a satisfactory return on my investment. I believe this offer presents a compelling opportunity for both of us. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
